media_clip_exists: The media pool already contains this clip.
enter_api_key: Enter API key in the configuration panel.
download_json: Move minimax_voice_data.json to the plugin directory.
请下载minimax_voice_data.json文件到插件目录
download_pcm: Move minimax_voice_data.pcm to the plugin directory.
请下载minimax_voice_data.pcm文件到插件目录
select_save_path: Select a save path in the configuration panel.
前往配置栏选择保存路径.
clone_id_error: Please enter the clone name and clone ID!
请输入克隆名称和克隆ID！
file_size: Exported file exceeds 20MB and may not be uploadable!
导出文件超过 20MB，可能无法上传！
duration_seconds: Marks During should be between 10 seconds and 5 minutes!
标记长度应在10秒到5分钟之间！
insert_mark: Please use Mark points to indicate the reference audio range first!
请先使用Mark点标记参考音频范围！
prev_txt: Please enter the audition text in the text box!
请在文本框输入试听文本！
error_1002: 请求频率超限，请稍后再试！
error_1041: 连接数限制,请联系我们!
error_1042: 非法字符超过最大比例（超过输入的 10%）
error_1044: 克隆提示词相似度检查失败！
error_20132: 语音克隆样本或voice_id参数错误！
error_2038: 用户语音克隆功能被禁用！
error_2042: You don't have access to this voice_id!
error_2048: 语音克隆提示音频太长！
